title: Free 1 week trial
text: I signed up for the one week trial and it charged my card $9.99 so is this a scam? I want my money back.

title: Doing too much
text:
I used to really like the free version of the app, I didn’t mind watching a bunch of ads or anything because I do understand that it’s a way to make money. The app itself is wonderful for what it can do with pictures!! 
Lately, however, the app has gone super downhill. You only get 3 free downloads every 14 hours unless you want to pay $5/WEEK for lite version. Which is just absolutely ridiculous. I’ve never seen a photo editing app become so greedy so quickly in my entire life. Definitely will be looking for different apps to use.

title: Wish I could get a refund
text: Loved this for years. Just used to clear up old photos. Had multiple options for this included in my yearly subscription price. Now they’ve made my subscription “light” (it’s only around $40 but it’s beside the point) and introduced a higher price pro. My subscription offers almost nothing now. I get one option when clearing up old photos and it looks freaky and horrible. I already have AI photo apps that make AI creations I by far prefer. I only wanted to clear up old photos. They changed what I purchased and it’s unfair

title: I wish I could give negative stars
text: Absolute scam, not only was this app horrible at creating AI, it also failed to even enhance normal pictures. It actually made pictures worse quality. On top of that the low life scam artists some how denied when I canceled my subscription and thus forced me to continue paying and  have not given any refund whatsoever despite I absolutely canceled subscription immediately after seeing how poor quality this app is. Any 5 star reviews are no doubt fake. AVOID AT ALL COSTS!!!!!

title: Beware of Misleading Subscriptions
text: This company has tons of subscription offerings, often for the same amount of money but offering different / less features. For example the “Pro” Subscription is $5 a week and includes multiple features - but if you’re not careful and subscribe to the “Pro-Lite” model - you’ll only be able to enhance photos (you get none of the other features) but this is also $5 a week! The app itself is nice, they are sneaky with the numerous subscription options and Apple should crack down on this type of dishonesty/ shade offerings.

title: Misleading
text: Downloaded the app on a free trial basis to try it out as i need to increase the resolution on some old black and white family photos.  It asks you to grant permission to photos but, once you do, they remain in the app and cannot be saved to your device.  They only offer the option to share on social platforms or to send a link through text.  And, if you want to delete the photos you allowed it to access, you have to search their privacy policy for the instructions on how to send them a request.  Really messed up, avoid this app.

title: I work in tech and can’t figure out how to use the app
text: I work in tech and nonetheless I can’t figure this app out. I wanted it for photo restoration, paid for the subscription and the only option in the app is to create AI avatars. When I clock the web button, I first tried continue with google, which just gave me a spinning circle and nothing happens. Next tried continue with Apple, same deal nothing happens just hangs. Not sure what I’m not getting about this app but definitely cancelling the subscription if I don’t figure it out soon. Should not be this complicated.

title: Deceptive Pricing
text:
I started the purchase on my computer and it took my payment information (for the free trial) then directed me to use the app, where it took my payment again. I made sure to cancel it from my iCloud subscriptions to not renew after the free trial, and I just received a charge for $9.99 for the week. It essentially made me initiate on two different so I would have to pay for one. 

Also, if you are over 22, the photos make you look like you have the Snapchat baby face filter on. Didn’t have one useable professional photo from using this.

title: Doesn’t produce photos a lot
text: App hangs and you have to constantly uninstall and reinstall

title: Locked out of paid account
text:
When I reinstalled remini on a fresh phone reset I was logged in as an anonymous user.

There does not appear to be a way to sign out of this user, nor does uninstalling or reinstalling the app give the option to sign into my paid account, I get put into this anonymous account.

I have a paid account and this is ANNOYING. I don’t want to have to do a fresh phone reset again after setting everything up due to this kind of an issue when otherwise the app is pretty good… but I have no access to paid features!

title: Careful
text: They continue to charge you even after you have canceled.

title: Do not purchase app
text: I honestly had a great experience with this app’s free version. I’ve been using it to colorize my nana’s family photos for a gift. But I had to purchase a month subscription in order to continue editing in bulk like I was. After I did this I lost almost every tool. I could no longer colorize, use oil paint, descratch, video editing, face animator, nothing. The tools disappeared from my home screen, only leaving enhance and enhance pro. If you’re going to use this app for more than just enhance, don’t bother getting a subscription, it’s a complete waste of money.

title: Ridiculous
text: I used to actually pay for this app before they forced an insane subscription price.  I ended my subscription when most of the images resulted in plastic-looking people with extra eyes or teeth.  Occasionally one would turn out okay, so I kept the app and just used the ad-packed free version.  Now, unless you want a washed out, overly plastic-looking image, you have to pay for a download that looks somewhat natural.  It’s seriously just two options: ugly for free or semi-decent-looking for $9.99 a WEEK.  I guess even the free version isn’t worth using, now.

title: DOES NOT WORK, THEY WILL GHOST YOU IF THEY CAN NOT FIX IT!!!
text:
I have used this app for over 2 years without any issues. When I decided to upgrade to pro and renew subscription at the same time, the app crashed and had stopped working for 4 days now. I contacted support for Apple and Remini. they came back with no resolve and I have been ghosted they have not fixed the app and have not refunded my money. I have completed all troubleshooting steps to get this app working, none of the steps were successful.
They do not show loyalty to long term customers. So disappointed this was my favorite go to app.

title: Why
text: You have to pay to use each filter for your photos and they don’t even give you a free trial to see if you like it it’s just goes straight to having you pay this amount of money which is very expensive some people may just want to try a filter to see if they like it but they CANT because it makes you pay right away. Oh so not recommended this app if you do not want to pay an ridiculous amount of money for an app that only puts filters over your photos and turns it into different people or culture

title: Unethical Business- DO NOT USE
text:
I signed up for a $0.99 trial, canceled it before it renewed, but was still charge $9.99 three times after. I requested a refund, showed proof I canceled the subscription before the trial ended and was ultimately told that I canceled from the Apple app side of things, but needed to from their website to officially cancel. 

That’s a very sneaky way to steal people’s money. It use to be businesses hoped you would forget to cancel their trial and get you that way, but not Remini. They’ll just claim you didn’t cancel properly, even when screen shot proof is provided. 

Subscribe at your own risk.

title: Too many adds
text: Just deleted this app after having it for years because the entire thing is add pop ups. I understand watching an add for a free edit, but you can’t even open the add without being stuck on an add screen forever.

title: Changes ethnicity
text: All it did was lighten my skin and changed my ethnic features

title: Too many ads
text: The app has way too many ads now, it’s ridiculous. There’s at least 2-3 ads that pops up as soon as you open the app, literally before you can do anything. It’s way too annoying & it’s not going to push anyone to purchase premium to remove the ads, but instead, it’ll push people to find another app that has less ad interference. Also, please remove the automated predetermined enhancement selections. I hate having to always deselect the color fix & deselect the face prettier options. Those should be off by default.

title: Worked the first time
text: Worked pretty good the first time until I wanted to change the ai model so after I deleted that then went to upload photos to the app it wouldn’t let me. Just pulled up the free trial and every time I clicked on the X it would stay on the choose this model. Tried to get help from the company but they only responded once and never got back to me I waited because I knew email was a slow process but it should not take a week to fix something so simple. I hope that this app works for others but I’ll have to delete it for now.

title: Money Hungry
text: I remember when this app used to be where you could watch ads to receive the photo enhancements, now it is all AI and you have to pay for everything and all that watching a 30 second ad gets you is a crappy overly edited photo. it is $10 a week just to use the app and all of its features. It is full of AI filters, AI generated edits, and a bunch of other useless AI tools. There are so many other great apps and websites that will allow you to get the same products for free and better results. Would not recommend this up to anybody at all.

title: i miss when the ads were thirty seconds or less
text: uninstalled cuz im getting nearly one minute ads and even if i cancel the process it keeps me on the same ad until it hits 0

title: Nope
text: I tried the life version. I’m a black version, I’m not white and it did not work at all. The grated image looks nothing like me. I’m requesting a refund.

title: Do NOT buy
text: I tried the $.99 and the pics looked nothing like me. I have short hair & all pics featured long horribly styled hair and made the skin look like I was in my 20’s not late 50s. Sent me an email it was non-refundable. So unless ur in your 20s don’t waste your money.

title: App
text: LOVED this app until recently. They charged me $20 TWICE two days in a row when my subscription is only $9.99 a week. What really is annoying the app has not allowed me to open it for five days now. So not only are they over charging me, I can’t even get onto the app. I’ve emailed customer support multiple times with no response. I’ve deleted and redownloaded the app multiple times. I’ve updated my phone, I’ve shut it off. I’ve tried everything. Would be great if their ‘customer’ service would answer and fix the app. So I can at least get my moneys worth.

title: Do not even try!
text: The will continue to charge even if you cancel during a trial.

title: The Ads
text:
Okay, pull it together the amount of ads to even try this app has gotten ridiculous. I have used this app paying for subscription off and on for over a year now. 
I used to love the app until I had to watch four ads just to get a picture enhanced no one has time for that no one will ever have time for that. When it becomes obvious that advertising is more what this app is about than actually trying the features. I don’t know if it’s Apple doing it and it’s just because you’re stuck on their platform, but it is a mess.

title: Awful, don’t even bother
text: I had a terrible experience with the Remini app. My daughter purchased it without realizing it was a $9.99 weekly subscription. Now, despite the app's refund drop-down section, they refuse to refund my money, claiming all payments are non-refundable. Why even have a refund option if it's not honored? I've called twice—first, I was assured my account would be canceled and refunded, but neither happened, and I was charged again. This app is awful and has poor customer service. If I could rate it zero stars, I would. Avoid this app at all costs.

title: Nope
text: I got this solely for the “try a new hairstyle” feature. They have like 10 styles to choose from. The end result looked almost nothing like me bc the “enhance” looks fake. Might try “restore” before I get rid of it, but might not…

title: Keeps charging me even after a .99 download and a subscription cancellation
text: I had to pay .99 just to download and then to actually try any of the “filters” it wanted to charge me another $9.99. I cancelled immediately but now two weeks later I have been charged 9.99 twice. I cannot unsubscribe and I have deleted the app. This is a waste of money and time!!

title: You are doubling the price? How greedy!
text: This is one of my favorite apps and one I use all the time. Even though it often it distorts the faces. I don’t have much money and the $4.99 a month subscription was hard on me but I just liked it so much I went on struggling to pay it. Now you greedy chumps are DOUBLING the price! $9.99! Not a dollar hike but DOUBLING it! Absolutely no freaking way. On November 14 I am deleting the app. I hope you go bankrupt you greedy scoundrels.

title: Overly annoying ads
text:
The app works well if you can get through the HUGE amount of advertisements. Every move requires two unskipable ads that keep popping up over and over, and are often the SAME ads back to back. 
But, after about five minutes of ads, it does a nice job of enhancing photos.

title: About Remini
text: Too much add is not expected just tired of it otherwise not bad

title: Not even close
text:
The enhancement pictures were worse than my original selfies. 
I gave 2 stars instead of 1 because the cartoon enhancements was fun to play with

title: Updated App Disappoints
text: When I first started using Remini, you had all these different options to choose from to enhance your photos (colorize- b&w-> color, being a favorite), besides the regular enhance option. Those options are no longer available and it’s really disappointing, especially when you pay for premium. I really wish the devs would listen to us and bring these options back. Until then, I can’t give this app more than 2 stars; and Remini is my favorite photo enhancing app😕

title: Too perfect
text: The AI is to a unnatural looking, doesn’t look like me and or is too perfect

title: Features aren’t proportional
text: The photos looked awful. They made the features of my face far too large for any of the bodies they put it on. Waste of money.

title: Missing features
text: I started in the web site and was able to upscale a single photo which was then transferred to the app after I purchased a subscription. I went straight to the app and it did not have an image upscaler anywhere in the app. I tried to use the web site again and it kept sending me to the app. That’s the only thing I wanted it for. Going to have to unsubscribe.

title: Why?
text: I have been using this app for so long with almost all the options by watching ads, and suddenly with this recent update, I have to go pro just to use them again? I feel iffy about the idea of starting to pay $10 weekly just to use certain features that were free before. I hope none of that stays forever, as I really did use this app so much to enhance my photos, but I think I'll finally turn over to something different. I think it was cool while it lasted for me.

title: Ads and quality
text:
I had this app for like 1.5 or 2 years. It was so good back then I felt like this is the best app. There was no watermark or anything the only bad thing was you could only do 5 photo per day and seeing an ad when you selected your photo but it was great.

And right now when you select your photo you first see a 60 seconds ad, then there is watermark under your photo and the worst is the quality, it makes beards and hair so cartoonish and sharpened it looks so bad and it’s not as smooth and good as it was and when you want save your photo you see another 60 seconds ad.

This is just a strategy or trick for all the new apps. First they make it free with some ads then when they see their app gets famous gets lots of downloads then they add more thing like subscriptions and other stuff.

Still not a bad app.

title: After the new update could not save so I deleted it.
text:
After your new update I had to delete your app. I watched the videos then I clicked to save it and your app wouldn’t let me save it after watching those ADS. So I deleted your app. 

Update on your app. There’s been no improvement to fix the problems with you app and what your charging for your app isn’t worth it. Your app would be great, but it need some major work done on it. I’m still old school, digital photos are great, but still love my 35mm camera. Here’s the problem with your app. I took out some old photos one major photo is of my dad and his best friend. I used your app and Oh My God, I couldn’t believe how your app took a photo that was slightly blurry and needed some tone adjustment and your results was horrible. Your app took my dad’s friend glasses on his face left part of the glasses on his face, the other half was on his lips. Part of his lip was up to his nose, and the results got worse. So I did it again, and it came out the same. I took another old photo used your app again the results was very bad. Out of all the photos I tested your app on, I only got one good results. For some reason your app changes the person face. I restore old photos but wanted an app that wouldn’t take me a long time to restore. The old fashion way could take me almost two months. I would love to buy your app, but not like the results I get. Cindy

title: Frozen
text: Freezes the devices up,  UNINSTAL ASAP

title: Eh.
text: It’s okay but it needs opacity! There should be a way for us to diminish some of the edit work; a dial of some sort. This is actually a hit or miss, because sometimes the pictures come out perfectly, and sometimes the pictures come out looking very unnatural and unflattering. There should definitely be a feature that lets you decide how much editing you want done to the picture; then this app would be a full 5 stars. Until that happens it will remain a 3-star app.

title: Not for Me
text: Photo enhancements are good for pictures that are people focus. However, if you are looking to improve the scenery in the background or sharpen the images… it does nothing. The only option is to blur it. The AI Generators are awful. I thought it would be fun to see the “toon” version of me but it literally turns everyone into a white person with blue eyes lol! I upload a few to play with and regardless of your skin tone or ethnicity, it will generate a Caucasian cartoon version of your pose.

title: Model wears black, I want to wear black.
text:
Here for professional type photos. The models that I have selected are wearing black yet seldom do the images come back with me wearing black. I just want some images with me in black!

As far as getting my face right, the AI gets better with more tries although I had to delete and upload new photos of myself a ton of times to get it close. 

I also have long hair but the photos come back with my hair 6-10 inches too short.

title: They got rid of some of the best features
text: I loved this app until they got rid of the video editor, face animator,  colorizer and descratcher ( basically the features that I use the most)  along with all of the other features.... even history. I had over 25 pro cards as well which magically disappeared.  I think it is in poor taste to get rid of the features that a lot of your customers used and loved... Is a subscription even worth it now?

title: High hopes, but clearly not for me.
text: I’m assigned female at birth & trying to generate photos using my pictures, indicated I am female, and used a female model. I keep getting AI generated pictures of people who are obviously men. I’m only able to get pictures of “me” as a woman when I select the pregnant model, but I was really wanting some professional looking photos to use as headshots! I do have very masculine features, but so do a lot of women. Maybe some tweaking of the AI is in order? I don’t know.

title: Does what it claims to do sometimes
text:
Hi,’on some of the pictures this app was used on like my late Brother and late sister in law as well after looking at it I noticed it actually changed my brothers face his mouth, his smile, teeth the pic of my little boys pics it actually scared me how much it changed his face he looked like an elf I can add the photos with original, and the copies that used with the photo editing and you’ll see that little different please let me know why
Thank you Patti

title: More options
text: The reason I’m giving 4 stars is because once you choose the photos to use for the AI to generate your photos you can’t change or re-pick the photos that you want to use. After you choose that’s it and i would really like to have the option to change which photos to use. If it wasn’t for that I would give five stars.

title: love but need improvement
text: this app works amazing on photos and used to work great on videos as-well until that option was removed also history was removed which also sucked. I saw the prompt in the app that video enhance will be coming back soon but do you know exactly when that is? because I’m getting really impatient! other than the flaws, the app is fantastic!

title: amazing… but one lil thing
text:
lemme just say, this app is amazing. i use it all the time. it does an amazing job of making the images clear, with some occasional photos that look a little weird, but they aren’t a problem for me.

but there’s one problem that does bother me. lately, i can only put one image through remini. lately, i’ve been needing to use the app multiple times, and put more than one photo through, and i always get a notice saying it won’t work. or i’m off of wi-fi even though i’m on wi-fi. i would really like it if that problem was more under control. it’s been happening a lot for the past couple of weeks. 

other than that, the app is amazing and i would recommend it!

title: Best app
text: Please add free effects

title: Works well but….
text:
This is a great free app with many great features to enhances photos my only problem other than the fact that the enhancing is not the best, is that if you could add a feature for when u take a picture of text/words that is blurry and if you could  please try and attempt to make the words as clear as possible that would be great

Thank you, loved the app!

title: Love the app but
text: Best photo restoring app I’ve found so far. I really love it; however, I wish there was a one time payment option instead of a subscription. I’m not ok with this kind of app taking money weekly, monthly or even yearly. Just let me pay once and done. If they had that option it would be a 5 star rating from me. For now I will continue to watch those lame ads.

title: Hands?
text: I love using Remini! I’m a creative soul and love photography. The technology this app uses to create convincing images is more than impressive. I love using it for inspiration for makeup and hair looks as well. Now I know my preferences and can act on them accordingly! The only downfall I’ve found thus far is the bug with creating a realistic hand. Which I’m sure will be fixed asap. Thank you for this fun creative outlet!

title: Love the app
text: The enhancement tool on this app is amazing!!!

title: BYZ
text:
This app has become my favorite go-to for enhancing photos, and I'm consistently impressed by its performance.

However, I do have a couple of suggestions for further improvement:

1. By default, the app alters the colors unless you manually select the original color after enhancement. This can be quite bothersome. I would appreciate it if the original colors were preserved by default, with the option to change them if desired.

2. I eagerly await the addition of batch enhancement functionality. The ability to enhance multiple photos at once would be a tremendous time and effort saver, sparing me from the tedious task of enhancing each photo individually.

title: I love it!
text:
This has changed my way of gift giving!
It keeps memories alive. It bring life to my photos.
I use it everyday! Thank you!!!

Grateful in Hollister,CA

title: Remini
text: This has to be my favorite photo app this year! I use it to enhance so many of my photos. The difference is amazing, yet it doesn’t take away from the original picture. I would recommend this app to anyone who takes a lot of photos (like myself) and wants to make their photos extra special.

title: This is amazing!!
text: This app makes ordinary photos look highly refined and professional!! I love how it adds extra pixels to increase the quality of the photos and the overall photo enhancement feature which is just a click of a button for the whole picture to be enhanced, including background! I love it!!

title: Remini

title: Wow! Was able to restore my grandfathers Korean War photos!
text: I had some old Kodak photos from my grandparents that were small and hard to make out detail. This incredible AI system was able to really bring out deep definition and it gave our family photos a whole new level of depth and detail… really incredible software here!

title: Great app! Perfect for refining and quick editing with amazing results!
text: I love this app! Just the exact thing I need it to do and then I making my further edits in photoshop which is great that I’m able to download a tif files with the layers of my edit. Makes my life much easier and quicker results on my end too! Highly recommend!!

title: Please let us choose if we want teeth fixed lol!!

title: I was skeptical but wow
text: I was skeptical as so many apps imply or fake good results. This worked flawlessly. I had a picture of my father from before he passed 4 years ago. It was fuzzy. I ran it through this app and had fantastic results. Makes me wish I didn’t delete so many blurry photos. I think many would have been salvaged.

title: So cool!
text: I am currently working on restoring old photos for a book project and this app is indispensable! For those of you who are unaware, crisper lines lead to more accurate colorization of old photos. So, if you are looking at colorizing old photos, I definitely recommend running them through this app first so that you have the best quality photograph to Colorize.
